name: The Music of Her Life
description:
Explore the life of an old woman through memories and music!

  • Touch objects and trigger memories connected to them. 
  • Play a butterfly-catching game to decide which memory you'll keep.
  • Each object corresponds to a music line, and all objects together make a little symphony!
  • Each memory is different, and so is the musical instrument and melody attached to it - so there are 32 possible life symphonies.

Known issues: close-up images of items might not revert to the original smaller image. Please close and restart the game if encountered.
